attributes.action: Stop the longton travellers site (stoke on Trent)
attributes.additional_details:
Proposals are in place to bring a travellers site to be located near Power Grove, Astro Grove and Foley Road in Longton, Stoke on Trent. This is near St Thomas Moore High School.
Please forward this as far and wide as we are requesting to the House of Commons the lane is not to be sold for any development in line withe requirements of the Public Open Space order.
